name: Ideal city generator
description:
Hello, 

this is a student project, exploring the idea of generative environments.

After checking it out, please fill in a questionary provided under this link.

I do not own music and  SFX used in the project.

Useful shortKeys:

Click escape to exit the game

Click R to reload to empty scene.

After unpacking the rar file, click Degree_SecondTry.exe to play.

Beaware of loud noises.

The program is not greatly optimalised, so keep in mind to check on your CPU and RAM just in case.

Btw, I'm sill working on it so I'll be droping another build soon. :3
